item.title: 5 Errors? Not To Bad
item.dc:creator: @ClairtyX ClairtyX
item.description:
@ClairtyX wrote:

source\server\model\players\DialogueHandler.java:40: error: cannot find symbol if(npcID == 9114){ ^ symbol: variable npcID location: class DialogueHandler source\server\model\players\DialogueHandler.java:41: error: cannot find symbol NPCDialogue = 36; ^ symbol: variable NPCDialogue location: class DialogueHandler source\server\model\players\DialogueHandler.java:43: error: cannot find symbol if(NPCDialogue = 36 && totalLevel >= 100){ ^ symbol: variable NPCDialogue location: class DialogueHandler source\server\model\players\DialogueHandler.java:43: error: cannot find symbol if(NPCDialogue = 36 && totalLevel >= 100){ ^ symbol: variable totalLevel location: class DialogueHandler source\server\model\players\DialogueHandler.java:44: error: cannot find symbol resetStats(); ^ symbol: method resetStats() location: class DialogueHandler Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 5 errors Press any key to continue . . .

Ahhh, I am trying to add a prestige system but it’s not working to well!

Here is the code i was trying to add please edit it if you know what’s wrong

[code=java] case 35:
sendNpcChat4("", “Hello there!”, “I am the master of prestiges!”, “Do you wish to prestige?”, c.talkingNpc, “Arhein”);
c.nextChat = 36;
break;
case 36:
sendOption4(“What is Prestige?”, “What is my current prestige level?”, “Yes, I would like to prestige!”, “Can I see your Prestige store please?”);
break;

            case 39:

if(npcID == 9114){
NPCDialogue = 36;
}
if(NPCDialogue = 36 && totalLevel >= 100){
resetStats();
} else {
c.sendMessage(“You don’t have the requirtments to prestige”);
}
break;[/code]
